Lynn.Melrose-Wakefield Hospital: Melrose-Wakefield Hospital is a 234-bed non-profit hospital located in Melrose, Massachusetts. Melrose-Wakefield Hospital is affiliated with Lawrence Memorial Hospital of Medford (which is transitioning mostly to outpatient specialty services, rather than inpatient care). Melrose-Wakefield Hospital provides many different areas of patient care including inpatient Medical Surgical, Telemetry, Maternity, Labor and Delivery, and Psychiatric, in addition to many outpatient services.
